reviewText: John Eldredge is a Christian pastor/evangelist with the gift of showing Christians how to engage in their local communities. This is a series of 4, thirty minute seminars on how to take Biblical Citizenship and the gospel into the community where you live. To begin with prayer for those in authority over your city and schools. Excellent, engaging, inspiring examples and simple plans to put Christianity into action. Older video but timeless information. Well worth the time.
